name: en-kpaam-cam
title: KPAAM-CAM - Documenting Africa's endangered languages and rural forms of multilingualism
description: KPAAM-CAM stands for Key Pluridisciplinary Advances on African Multilingualism â€“ CAMeroon and it is a research project based at the University at Buffalo, NY, USA.
extra_description: From 2014-2023, KPAAM-CAM has organized training and fieldwork for MA and PhD students in linguistics, geography, and anthropology at the Universities of Yaounde 1, Buea, Bamenda, Dschang, and Maroua.
